nodes.title: Character Actions
widgets_values: The beautiful woman loses her balance, is startled, and falls off her inflatable tube into the pool with a big splash and spilling her drink. She then surfaces and grabs the side of the pool, wet and dripping but looks directly at the camera and smiles wryly.

nodes.title: Camera, Lighting & Quality
widgets_values: The camera is steady and follows the subject. The realistic anime style is maintained throughout the video. Her hands and body are perfect and her face remains beautiful. The video is a masterpiece, of the best quality, and very aesthetic.

nodes.title: Alt-Description 🐍
widgets_values: The image shows a young woman in a swimming pool. She is wearing a thin pink bikini and has a pair of mouse ears on her head. She is holding a green drink with a slice of lime and a straw in her hand. The woman is sitting on an inflatable ring in the water, which is yellow in color and has her legs stretched out in front of her with her pink tail between her legs. She has a big smile on her face and is making a peace sign with her fingers. The background shows a city skyline at sunset with tall buildings and skyscrapers. The sky is orange and pink, and the sun is setting in the distance. The overall mood of the image is playful and summery.

nodes.title: Auto-Description 🐍
widgets_values: The image shows a young woman in a pink bikini sitting on an inflatable ring in a swimming pool. She is holding a green drink with a slice of lime and a straw in her hand. The woman has white hair styled in a cat-like manner and is wearing pink sunglasses. The background shows a city skyline at sunset with tall buildings and skyscrapers. The sky is orange and pink, and the sun is setting in the distance. The overall mood of the image is playful and summery.

A beautiful girl long blue hair wearing a pure white silk dress happily walking through a forrest. She cheerfully struts forward, her huge boobs swaying left and right as she walks. Her hair and dress are blown to the left by a gentle breeze. Her hair, boobs, and dress all flow naturally with her movements. The camera focuses on her, while the scenery gets farther away. She is lit by warm light of the sun above her, enhancing the scene in a realistic anime style, high-quality video with sharp, clear details. Her face is beautiful and detailed. The realistic anime style is maintained throughout the video.
talking, speaking, chatting,色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走，
If you have Triton installed, connect this for ~30% speed increase

nodes.title: Sage and Radial Attention
widgets_values:
Use Sageattn if you have it installed can be used for almost double inference speed, otherwise use the default sdpa attention mode.

Radial sage attention seems to be the current fastest setup, but its updating everyday.

all other settings and models can remain the same.

nodes.title: Prompting
widgets_values:
In the default mode. You only need to prompt the charater's action and nothing else.

If you want to alter the camera, lighting and quality, you can edit that box.

If gens are turning out weird, check the Auto-Description, it could be that the vision model has erroniously described something in the image. If so, copy that text to the Alt-Description, correct it, and then connect it to where the Auto-Description was connected.

nodes.title: Optimizers & Enhancers
widgets_values:
These are optimized for the Wan2_2-I2V-14B-480P HIGH / LOW generations with 81 frames (5 seconds) at either auto-sized or optimal size.

These settings are optimized for maximum quality, but still with some minor speed boost.

If you want to trade quality for speed, like, for instance, when searching for a good seed, dial up the TeaCache rel_l1_thresh, you can go up to 0.3, after which it will no longer have an effect. At the default 0.1, its at maximum quality while still retaining some speed boost.

There is no need to change any of the other settings.

nodes.title: Loras
widgets_values:
loras go here. Hook up addtional lora selectors if want it. Hook up more if you want multiple.

Just use the correct lightx2v lora from Kijai's Hugging Faces. That's the current best.

Due to Wan 2.2's High / Low model setup, loras need to be loaded twice. If you need to load additional loras, chain them behind the lightx2v loras

nodes.title: Block Swap & VRAM Management
widgets_values:
Adjust the blocks to swap based on your VRAM, this is a tradeoff between speed and memory usage.

Alternatively there's option to use VRAM management introduced in DiffSynt-Studios. This is usually slower, but saves even more VRAM compared to BlockSwap

nodes.title: Clip Vision & Text Encoder
widgets_values:
Get the clip vision file here:

https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Wan_2.1_ComfyUI_repackaged/tree/main/split_files/clip_vision

Get the text encoder here:

https://huggingface.co/NSFW-API/NSFW-Wan-UMT5-XXL/blob/main/nsfw_wan_umt5-xxl_bf16.safetensors

nodes.title: Vae
widgets_values: Kijai's Wan 2.2 vae does not work, but that might be fixed. The other problem with it is that its huge. So I still use the old Wan 2.1 vae, which can be found in the main Kijai Hugging Faces folder.

nodes.title: Auto-Sizer
widgets_values:
The nodes in the middle automatically takes the image size and resizes it to WanVideo's optimal dimensions, maintaining proportions while insuring the dimensions are divisible by 16.

If you want to adjust it manually, dissconnect 'width' and 'height' and enter it manually.

nodes.title: Image Resize
widgets_values:
If you want to reisze the image manually, simply disconnected the wideth_input and height_input.

For the model 'Wan2_2-I2V-14B', the optimal size is either 832 x 480 or 480 x 832. The square equivilent is 640 x 640. You can go up to 720p if your VRAM can handle it.

nodes.title: Video Length
widgets_values:
Enter the length of the video. You can generally go between 2 to 7 seconds on 24 GB VRAM. 9 seconds is possible on 32 GB VRAM.

This workflow is optimized for a 5 second video. 9 second videos tend to loop.
